name: pnp-powerplatform-samples-alt-text-generator
title: Alt Text Generator
shortDescription: This sample allows the user to enter a link to a .png image into a copilot and then it generates alt text for the image using OpenAI's gpt-4o model.
longDescription: This sample allows the user to enter a link to a .png image into a copilot and then it generates alt text for the image using OpenAI's gpt-4o model.

references.name: Microsoft Power Platform documentation
references.description: Discover how to make the most of Microsoft Power Platform products with online training courses, docs, and videos covering product capabilities and how-to guides.
